Elyes Baccar bụ onye Tunisia na-eme ihe nkiri na onye nduzi ihe nkiri, odee na onye na-emepụta ihe. A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri She & He, Lost in Tunisia na Tunis by Night
A mụrụ Elyes na Tunis, Tunisia

Ọ gụrụ Directing na French CLCF na Paris. Ọ gakwara mmemme ọzụzụ FEMIS na Paris na mmemme njikwa ọdịbendị na Goethe-Institut na Berlin. Ọ malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-enyere onye nduzi aka na ihe nkiri dịka Star Wars na Tunisia.

N'afọ 2006, Elyes duziri ihe nkiri mbụ ya She & he (Elle et Lui), nke emere na mmemme ihe nkiri mba ụwa. N'afọ 2011, ihe ngosi mbụ ya bụ Rouge Parole, banyere mgbanwe Tunisia. Ihe nkiri ya nke abụọ Tunis by night (Tunis Ellil), gosipụtara na Cairo International Film Festival na 2017. Ọ bụ onye ọbịa na-ekwu okwu na Mahadum Columbia, Goethe-Institut na German Commission for UNESCO.
